## VerticalFlyout.layout\_() method

Lay out the blocks in the flyout.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected layout_(contents: FlyoutItem[], gaps: number[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |

|  gaps | number\[\] | The visible gaps between blocks. |
